snippet: In this middle-grade novel, a boy must break free from a cycle of guilt and recrimination after an accidental death.
abstract: Jonathan Mahler reviews children's book Lost in the Sun by Lisa Graff.
lead_paragraph: In this middle-grade novel, a boy must break free from a cycle of guilt and recrimination after an accidental death.

headline.main: ‘Lost in the Sun,’ by Lisa Graff
